title: First and second members of an ordered pair

blocks.name: c1st
blocks.content: Extend the definition of a class to include the first member an ordered pair function.
blocks.origin: const class c1st { 1st }

blocks.name: diff.c1st.s
diff.c1st.c
diff.c1st.w
c2nd
blocks.content: Extend the definition of a class to include the second member an ordered pair function.
blocks.origin: const class c2nd { 2nd }

blocks.name: diff.c2nd.s
diff.c2nd.c
diff.c2nd.w
df-1st
blocks.content: Define a function that extracts the first member, or abscissa, of an ordered pair. Theorem ~ op1st proves that it does this. For example, ` ( 1st `` <. 3 , 4 >. ) = 3 ` . Equivalent to Definition 5.13 (i) of [Monk1] p. 52 (compare ~ op1sta and ~ op1stb ). The notation is the same as Monk's. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2004.)

blocks.name: df-2nd
blocks.content: Define a function that extracts the second member, or ordinate, of an ordered pair. Theorem ~ op2nd proves that it does this. For example, ` ( 2nd `` <. 3 , 4 >. ) = 4 ` . Equivalent to Definition 5.13 (ii) of [Monk1] p. 52 (compare ~ op2nda and ~ op2ndb ). The notation is the same as Monk's. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2004.)

blocks.name: 1stval
blocks.content: The value of the function that extracts the first member of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1stval(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cuni(cdm(csn(c0))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cuni(cdm(csn(c0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, c1st, cuni(cdm(csn(c0))), cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  unieqd(cdm(csn(cv(hs0))), cdm(csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-1st(hs0)
  uniex(cdm(csn(c0)))
  dmex(csn(c0))
  snex(c0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c1st, c0), cuni(cdm(csn(c0))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, c1st)
  syl6eq(cuni(cdm(csn(c0))), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  unieqd(cdm(csn(c0)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl6eq(cdm(csn(c0)), emptycls, cdm(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  dmeqd(csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  dm0()
  uni0()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cdm(csn(c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 1stval(class c0) {
  ⊢ (1st ` c0)= ⋃ dom({ c0 })
} = {
  pm2.61i((1st ` c0)= ⋃ dom({ c0 }), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, c1st, ⋃ dom({ c0 }), ⋃ dom({ hs0 }))
  unieqd(dom({ hs0 }), dom({ c0 }), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd({ hs0 }, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  sneq(hs0, c0)
  df-1st(hs0)
  uniex(dom({ c0 }))
  dmex({ c0 })
  snex(c0)
  eqtr4d((1st ` c0), ⋃ dom({ c0 }), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c0, c1st)
  syl6eq(⋃ dom({ c0 }), emptycls, ⋃ ∅, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  unieqd(dom({ c0 }), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eq(dom({ c0 }), emptycls, dom(∅), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  dmeqd({ c0 }, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  biimpi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, { c0 } = ∅)
  snprc(c0)
  dm0()
  uni0()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ dom({ c0 }))
}

blocks.name: 2ndval

thm 2ndval(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), cuni(crn(csn(c0))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), cuni(crn(csn(c0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, c2nd, cuni(crn(csn(c0))), cuni(crn(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  unieqd(crn(csn(cv(hs0))), crn(csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  df-2nd(hs0)
  uniex(crn(csn(c0)))
  rnex(csn(c0))
  snex(c0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c2nd, c0), cuni(crn(csn(c0))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, c2nd)
  syl6eq(cuni(crn(csn(c0))), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  unieqd(crn(csn(c0)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl6eq(crn(csn(c0)), emptycls, crn(emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  rneqd(csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  rn0()
  uni0()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(csn(c0))))

blocks.pretty:
thm 2ndval(class c0) {
  ⊢ (2nd ` c0)= ⋃ ran({ c0 })
} = {
  pm2.61i((2nd ` c0)= ⋃ ran({ c0 }), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, c2nd, ⋃ ran({ c0 }), ⋃ ran({ hs0 }))
  unieqd(ran({ hs0 }), ran({ c0 }), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd({ hs0 }, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  sneq(hs0, c0)
  df-2nd(hs0)
  uniex(ran({ c0 }))
  rnex({ c0 })
  snex(c0)
  eqtr4d((2nd ` c0), ⋃ ran({ c0 }), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c0, c2nd)
  syl6eq(⋃ ran({ c0 }), emptycls, ⋃ ∅, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  unieqd(ran({ c0 }), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eq(ran({ c0 }), emptycls, ran(∅), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  rneqd({ c0 }, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  biimpi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, { c0 } = ∅)
  snprc(c0)
  rn0()
  uni0()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ ran({ c0 }))
}

blocks.name: op1stg
blocks.content: Extract the first member of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm op1stg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveqeq2d(c1st, cop(c0, cv(hs1)), c0, cop(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  op1st(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm op1stg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(1st ` < c0, c2 >)= c0)
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (1st ` < c0, c2 >)= c0, (1st ` < hs0, hs1 >)= hs0, (1st ` < c0, hs1 >)= c0)
  eqeq12d((1st ` < hs0, hs1 >), hs0, (1st ` < c0, hs1 >), c0, hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(c1st, < hs0, hs1 >, < c0, hs1 >, hs0 = c0)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  fveqeq2d(c1st, < c0, hs1 >, c0, < c0, c2 >, hs1 = c2)
  opeq2(hs1, c2, c0)
  op1st(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((1st ` < c0, hs1 >)= c0)
  diff.hs1.w((1st ` < c0, c2 >)= c0)
}

blocks.name: op2ndg
blocks.content: Extract the second member of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm op2ndg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), c2))
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), cv(hs1)))
  fveqeq2d(c2nd, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), c2, wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  fveq2d(c2nd, cop(c0, cv(hs1)), cop(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  opeq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  op2nd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm op2ndg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(2nd ` < c0, c2 >)= c2)
} = {
  vtocl2g(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (2nd ` < c0, c2 >)= c2, (2nd ` < hs0, hs1 >)= hs1, (2nd ` < c0, hs1 >)= hs1)
  fveqeq2d(c2nd, < hs0, hs1 >, hs1, < c0, hs1 >, hs0 = c0)
  opeq1(hs0, c0, hs1)
  eqeq12d((2nd ` < c0, hs1 >), hs1, (2nd ` < c0, c2 >), c2, hs1 = c2)
  fveq2d(c2nd, < c0, hs1 >, < c0, c2 >, hs1 = c2)
  opeq2(hs1, c2, c0)
  id(hs1 = c2)
  op2nd(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((2nd ` < c0, hs1 >)= hs1)
  diff.hs1.w((2nd ` < c0, c2 >)= c2)
}

blocks.name: ot1stg
blocks.content: Extract the first member of an ordered triple. (Due to infrequent usage, it isn't worthwhile at this point to define special extractors for triples, so we reuse the ordered pair extractors for ~ ot1stg , ~ ot2ndg , ~ ot3rdg .) (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ot1stg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c0))
} = {
  3impa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c0))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c0, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c5))
  fveq2d(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4)), cop(c0, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  syl5eq(cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4)), cop(c0, c2), cfv(c1st, cop(cop(c0, c2), c4)), wcel(c4, c5))
  fveq2i(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4), cop(cop(c0, c2), c4))
  df-ot(c0, c2, c4)
  mpan(wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(cop(c0, c2), c4)), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), universe))
  opex(c0, c2)
  op1stg(cop(c0, c2), universe, c4, c5)
  op1stg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ot1stg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5)→(1st `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >))= c0)
} = {
  3impa(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c5, (1st `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >))= c0)
  sylan9eqr((1st `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >)), c0, (1st ` < c0, c2 >), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c4 ∈ c5)
  fveq2d(c1st, (1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >), < c0, c2 >, c4 ∈ c5)
  syl5eq((1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >), < c0, c2 >, (1st ` < < c0, c2 >, c4 >), c4 ∈ c5)
  fveq2i(c1st, < c0, c2, c4 >, < < c0, c2 >, c4 >)
  df-ot(c0, c2, c4)
  mpan(c4 ∈ c5, (1st ` < < c0, c2 >, c4 >)= < c0, c2 >, < c0, c2 > ∈ 𝕌)
  opex(c0, c2)
  op1stg(< c0, c2 >, universe, c4, c5)
  op1stg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: ot2ndg
blocks.content: Extract the second member of an ordered triple. (See ~ ot1stg comment.) (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ot2ndg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c2))
} = {
  3impa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c2))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4))), c2, cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c5))
  fveq2d(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4)), cop(c0, c2), wcel(c4, c5))
  syl5eq(cfv(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4)), cop(c0, c2), cfv(c1st, cop(cop(c0, c2), c4)), wcel(c4, c5))
  fveq2i(c1st, cotp(c0, c2, c4), cop(cop(c0, c2), c4))
  df-ot(c0, c2, c4)
  mpan(wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(cop(c0, c2), c4)), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), universe))
  opex(c0, c2)
  op1stg(cop(c0, c2), universe, c4, c5)
  op2ndg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ot2ndg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5)→(2nd `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >))= c2)
} = {
  3impa(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c5, (2nd `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >))= c2)
  sylan9eqr((2nd `(1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >)), c2, (2nd ` < c0, c2 >), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c4 ∈ c5)
  fveq2d(c2nd, (1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >), < c0, c2 >, c4 ∈ c5)
  syl5eq((1st ` < c0, c2, c4 >), < c0, c2 >, (1st ` < < c0, c2 >, c4 >), c4 ∈ c5)
  fveq2i(c1st, < c0, c2, c4 >, < < c0, c2 >, c4 >)
  df-ot(c0, c2, c4)
  mpan(c4 ∈ c5, (1st ` < < c0, c2 >, c4 >)= < c0, c2 >, < c0, c2 > ∈ 𝕌)
  opex(c0, c2)
  op1stg(< c0, c2 >, universe, c4, c5)
  op2ndg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: 1stval2
blocks.content: Alternate value of the function that extracts the first member of an ordered pair. Definition 5.13 (i) of [Monk1] p. 52. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1stval2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c0)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))))
  3eqtr4a(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0)), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cint(cint(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqtr4i(cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cint(cint(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cv(hs0))
  op1st(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  op1stb(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  fveq2(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1st)
  inteqd(cint(c0), cint(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  inteq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), cint(cint(c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm 1stval2(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)→(1st ` c0)= ⋂ ⋂ c0)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (1st ` c0)= ⋂ ⋂ c0, ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1, c0 = < hs0, hs1 >)))
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c0)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, c0 = < hs0, hs1 >, (1st ` c0)= ⋂ ⋂ c0)
  3eqtr4a((1st ` c0), ⋂ ⋂ c0, (1st ` < hs0, hs1 >), ⋂ ⋂ < hs0, hs1 >, c0 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  eqtr4i((1st ` < hs0, hs1 >), ⋂ ⋂ < hs0, hs1 >, hs0)
  op1st(hs0, hs1)
  op1stb(hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)

thm oteqimp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, cotp(c1, c2, c3)), wi(w3a(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c3, c6)), w3a(wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), c3))))
} = {
  syl5ibr(wceq(c0, cotp(c1, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c3, c6)), w3a(wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), c3)), w3a(wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c1, c2, c3))), c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cotp(c1, c2, c3))), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cotp(c1, c2, c3)), c3)))
  3jca(w3a(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c3, c6)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c1, c2, c3))), c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cotp(c1, c2, c3))), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cotp(c1, c2, c3)), c3))
  ot1stg(c1, c4, c2, c5, c3, c6)
  ot2ndg(c1, c4, c2, c5, c3, c6)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c3, c6), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cotp(c1, c2, c3)), c3))
  ot3rdg(c3, c6, c1, c2)
  3anbi123d(wceq(c0, cotp(c1, c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), c3), wceq(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c1, c2, c3))), c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cotp(c1, c2, c3))), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cotp(c1, c2, c3)), c3))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), c1, cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cotp(c1, c2, c3))), wceq(c0, cotp(c1, c2, c3)))
  2fveq3(c0, cotp(c1, c2, c3), c1st, c1st)
  eqeq1d(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)), c2, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cotp(c1, c2, c3))), wceq(c0, cotp(c1, c2, c3)))
  2fveq3(c0, cotp(c1, c2, c3), c2nd, c1st)
  fveqeq2(c0, cotp(c1, c2, c3), c2nd, c3)
}

blocks.name: fo1st

thm fo1st() {
  |- wfo(c1st, universe, universe)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wfo(c1st, universe, universe), wfn(c1st, universe), wceq(crn(c1st), universe))
  fnmpti(hs0, c1st, universe, cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  uniex(cdm(csn(cv(hs0))))
  dmex(csn(cv(hs0)))
  snex(cv(hs0))
  eqtr4i(crn(c1st), universe, cab(hs1, wrex(hs0, universe, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0))))))))
  rnmpt(hs1, hs0, c1st, universe, cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  df-1st(hs0)
  abbi2i(hs1, universe, wrex(hs0, universe, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))))
  2th(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wrex(hs0, universe, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))))
  mp2an(wrex(hs0, universe, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), universe), wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)))))))
  opex(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))
  eqcomi(cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))))))
  op1sta(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  rspceeqv(hs0, cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), universe, cv(hs1), cuni(cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))))), cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  unieqd(cdm(csn(cv(hs0))), cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))))
  dmeqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))))
  sneq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)))
  df-fo(c1st, universe, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(cdm(csn(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))))))
}

  ⊢ (1st : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌)

  mpbir2an((1st : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌), 1st[Fn]𝕌, ran(1st)= 𝕌)

  df-1st(hs0)
  abbi2i(hs1, universe, ∃(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 = ⋃ dom({ hs0 })))
  2th(hs1 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 = ⋃ dom({ hs0 })))
  mp2an(∃(hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 = ⋃ dom({ hs0 })), < hs1, hs1 > ∈ 𝕌, hs1 = ⋃ dom({ < hs1, hs1 > }))
  opex(hs1, hs1)
  eqcomi(hs1, ⋃ dom({ < hs1, hs1 > }))
  op1sta(hs1, hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  rspceeqv(hs0, < hs1, hs1 >, universe, hs1, ⋃ dom({ < hs1, hs1 > }), ⋃ dom({ hs0 }))
  unieqd(dom({ hs0 }), dom({ < hs1, hs1 > }), hs0 = < hs1, hs1 >)
  dmeqd({ hs0 }, { < hs1, hs1 > }, hs0 = < hs1, hs1 >)
  sneq(hs0, < hs1, hs1 >)
  df-fo(c1st, universe, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ dom({ hs0 }))
  diff.hs0.c(< hs1, hs1 >)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)

}

thm br1steqg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(cop(c0, c2), c1st, c4), wceq(c4, c0)))
} = {
  3bitr3g(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(cop(c0, c2), c1st, c4), wceq(c4, c0), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c4), wceq(c0, c4))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c4, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  op1stg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c4), wbr(cop(c0, c2), c1st, c4)), wfn(c1st, universe), wcel(cop(c0, c2), universe))
  ax-mp(wfn(c1st, universe), wfo(c1st, universe, universe))
  fo1st()
  fofn(c1st, universe, universe)
  opex(c0, c2)
  fnbrfvb(c1st, universe, cop(c0, c2), c4)

}

  rgen2(hs1, hs2, c0, c1, wcel(cuni(cdm(csn(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), c0))

  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

thm fo1stres(class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  sylibr(wne(c0, emptycls), wfo(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), c1), wa(wf(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), c1), wceq(crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), c1)))
  jctil(wne(c0, emptycls), wf(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), c1), wceq(crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), c1))
  sylibr(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), c1), wa(wss(crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), c1), wss(c1, crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))))))
  jctil(wne(c0, emptycls), wss(crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), c1), wss(c1, crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)))))
  ssrdv(hs0, c1, crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  sylbi(wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))))), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  n0(hs1, c0)
  exlimiv(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))))))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)))))
  sylbir(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c0)))
  opelxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), cfv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c0)))
  syl6req(cv(hs0), cfv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c0)))
  fvres(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c0), c1st)
  op1st(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  mpan(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cxp(c1, c0)), wcel(cfv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)))), wfn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0)))
  ax-mp(wfn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0)), wf(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), c1))
  ffn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), c1)
  fnfvelrn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  ax-mp(wss(crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), c1), wf(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), c1))
  frn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), c1)
  eqss(crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0))), c1)
  f1stres(c1, c0)
  dffo2(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c0)), cxp(c1, c0), c1)

thm 1st2val(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cfv(c1st, c0)), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cfv(c1st, c0)), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c0)

  syl6eq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), c0), cv(hs0), cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

thm 1st2val(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ ({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0)=(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  pm2.61i(({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0)=(1st ` c0), c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylbi(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), ({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0)=(1st ` c0), ∃(hs0, ∃(hs1, c0 = < hs0, hs1 >)))
  elvv(hs0, hs1, c0)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, c0 = < hs0, hs1 >, ({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0)=(1st ` c0))
  eqtr4d(({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0), (1st ` c0), hs0, c0 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  syl6eq(({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0), hs0, ({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` < hs0, hs1 >), c0 = < hs0, hs1 >)
  fveq2(c0, < hs0, hs1 >, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 })
  eqtr3i(({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` < hs0, hs1 >), hs0, (hs0[{ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 }]hs1))
  df-ov(hs0, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 }, hs1)
  el2v(hs0, hs1, (hs0[{ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 }]hs1)= hs0)
  ovmpt2a(s0, s1, hs0, universe, hs1, universe, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 }, hs0, s0)
  simpl(s0 = hs0, s1 = hs1)
  eqcomi({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 }, (s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ s0))
  mpt2v(s0, s1, s2, s0)
  op1std(c0, hs0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  syl6eqr(({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0), (1st ` c0), ⋃ dom({ c0 }), ¬ c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  eqtr4d(({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0), ⋃ dom({ c0 }), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylnbir(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), ({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0)= ∅, c0 ∈ dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 }))
  eleq2i(c0, dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 }), (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  3eqtr4ri(dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 }), (𝕌 × 𝕌), { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌)}, { < s0, s1 > | ∃(s2, s2 = s0)})
  opabbii(s0, s1, (s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌), ∃(s2, s2 = s0))
  2th((s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌), ∃(s2, s2 = s0))
  pm3.2i(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  ax6ev(s2, s0)
  df-xp(s0, s1, universe, universe)
  dmoprab(s0, s1, s2, s2 = s0)
  ndmfv(c0, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 })
  syl6eq(⋃ dom({ c0 }), emptycls, ⋃ ∅, ¬ c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  unieqd(dom({ c0 }), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  necon1bi(dom({ c0 }), emptycls, c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  biimpri(dom({ c0 })≠ ∅, c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  dmsnn0(c0)
  uni0()
  1stval(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0)=(1st ` c0))
  diff.hs1.w(({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | s2 = s0 } ` c0)=(1st ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

thm 1stcof(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wf(ccom(c1st, c0), c1, c2))
} = {

  sylancr(wf(c0, c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wfn(ccom(c1st, c0), c1), wfn(c1st, universe), wf(c0, c1, universe))
  ax-mp(wfn(c1st, universe), wfo(c1st, universe, universe))

  3syl(wf(c0, c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wss(crn(cres(c1st, crn(c0))), crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c2, c3)))), wss(crn(c0), cxp(c2, c3)), wss(cres(c1st, crn(c0)), cres(c1st, cxp(c2, c3))))
  frn(c0, c1, cxp(c2, c3))

thm xp1st(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))))))
  elxp(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1))
  adantrr(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1))
  biimpar(wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1))
  eleq1d(cfv(c1st, c0), c1, cv(hs0), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  op1std(c0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1))
}

  sylibr(wa(wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)))), wcel(cuni(c0), cuni(cab(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))))
  mpcom(wa(wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)))), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  simprl(wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)))
  spcegv(hs0, c0, cxp(universe, universe), wa(wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)))), wa(wcel(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2))))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cuni(c0))

  eluniab(hs0, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  unieqi(cxp(c1, c2), cab(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))))
  eqtri(cxp(c1, c2), cab(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))), crab(hs0, cxp(universe, universe), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  xp2(hs0, c1, c2)
  df-rab(hs0, cxp(universe, universe), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cuni(c0), c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, c0), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), c2)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: op1steq
blocks.content: Two ways of expressing that an element is the first member of an ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm op1steq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wex(s0, wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wex(s0, wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  sseli(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cxp(universe, universe))
  xpss(c1, c2)
  impbid(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wex(s0, wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0)))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wex(s0, wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3)), wex(s0, wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  mpanr2(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))), wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqopi(c0, universe, universe, c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  spcev(s0, cfv(c2nd, c0), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0))))
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  eqeq2d(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0)), cop(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  opeq2(cv(s0), cfv(c2nd, c0), c3)
  exlimdv(s0, wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3))
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(c0, cop(c3, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wa(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0))))
  eqop(c0, universe, universe, c3, cv(s0))
  simpl(wceq(cfv(c1st, c0), c3), wceq(cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, cop(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  diff.cop.s(s0, c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cxp(universe, universe))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c1st, c0), c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm op1steq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1 × c2)→((1st ` c0)= c3 ↔ ∃(s0, c0 = < c3, s0 >)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈(c1 × c2), ((1st ` c0)= c3 ↔ ∃(s0, c0 = < c3, s0 >)), c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sseli(c0, (c1 × c2), (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  xpss(c1, c2)
  impbid(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (1st ` c0)= c3, ∃(s0, c0 = < c3, s0 >))
  ex(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (1st ` c0)= c3, ∃(s0, c0 = < c3, s0 >))
  syl((c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)∧(1st ` c0)= c3), ∃(s0, c0 = < c3, s0 >), c0 = < c3,(2nd ` c0)>)
  mpanr2(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (1st ` c0)= c3, c0 = < c3,(2nd ` c0)>, (2nd ` c0)=(2nd ` c0))
  eqid((2nd ` c0))
  eqopi(c0, universe, universe, c3, (2nd ` c0))
  spcev(s0, (2nd ` c0), c0 = < c3,(2nd ` c0)>, c0 = < c3, s0 >)
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  eqeq2d(c0, < c3, s0 >, < c3,(2nd ` c0)>, s0 =(2nd ` c0))
  opeq2(s0, (2nd ` c0), c3)
  exlimdv(s0, c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), c0 = < c3, s0 >, (1st ` c0)= c3)
  syl6bi(c0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), c0 = < c3, s0 >, (1st ` c0)= c3, ((1st ` c0)= c3 ∧(2nd ` c0)= s0))
  eqop(c0, universe, universe, c3, s0)
  simpl((1st ` c0)= c3, (2nd ` c0)= s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, < c3,(2nd ` c0)>)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c3, (2nd ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (1st ` c0), c3)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: opreuopreu
blocks.content: There is a unique ordered pair fulfilling a wff iff its components fulfil a corresponding wff. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm opreuopreu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1)))))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), wb(w1, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wb(wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0), wreu(s0, cxp(c0, c1), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  reubiia(s0, cxp(c0, c1), w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))))
  impbid(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))))
  syl5com(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))))
  elxpi(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  2eximdv(s1, s2, w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))
  ex(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1)
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)))
  impcom(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), w1)
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wi(w0, w1))
  biimprd(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  exlimdvv(s1, s2, wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1), w0)
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1), w0))
  biimpa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), w1, w0)
  syl(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(w1, w0), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))))
  mpbiri(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  pm3.2i(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  eqcomi(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  op1st(cv(s1), cv(s2))
  eqcomi(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  op2nd(cv(s1), cv(s2))
  vex(s1)
  vex(s2)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s1), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1st)
  eqeq2d(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c2nd)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: el2xptp
blocks.content: A member of a nested Cartesian product is an ordered triple. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm el2xptp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxp(cxp(c1, c2), c3)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cxp(cxp(c1, c2), c3)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))), wrex(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))
  elxp2(hs0, s2, c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3)
  rexxp(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))
  rexbidv(s2, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  eqeq2d(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  rexbii(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))), wrex(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  rexbii(s1, c2, wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  rexbii(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wceq(c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  eqeq2i(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  eqcomi(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  df-ot(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s2, c3, wceq(c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, cop(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))

}

thm el2xptp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈((c1 × c2)× c3)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < s0, s1, s2 >))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  3bitri(c0 ∈((c1 × c2)× c3), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < s0, s1, s2 >))), ∃(hs0 ∈(c1 × c2), ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < hs0, s2 >)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >))))
  elxp2(hs0, s2, c0, (c1 × c2), c3)
  rexxp(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < hs0, s2 >), ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >))
  rexbidv(s2, c3, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, c0 = < hs0, s2 >, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)
  eqeq2d(c0, < hs0, s2 >, < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  opeq1(hs0, < s0, s1 >, s2)
  rexbii(s0, c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)), ∃(s1 ∈ c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < s0, s1, s2 >)))
  rexbii(s1, c2, ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >), ∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < s0, s1, s2 >))
  rexbii(s2, c3, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, c0 = < s0, s1, s2 >)
  eqeq2i(c0, < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, < s0, s1, s2 >)
  eqcomi(< < s0, s1 >, s2 >, < s0, s1, s2 >)
  df-ot(s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s2 ∈ c3, c0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s2, c3, c0 = < hs0, s2 >)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, < hs0, s2 >)
  diff.cop.s(s0, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s2, c3, c0 = < hs0, s2 >)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, < hs0, s2 >)
  diff.cop.s(s1, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, < s0, s1 >)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cop.s(s2, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: releldm2

thm releldm2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wrel(c0), wb(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm5.21nd(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, universe)))
  anim2i(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  elex(c1, cdm(c0))
  anim2i(wrel(c0), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl6eqelr(c1, universe, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1))
  id(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1))
  fvex(c1st, cv(s0))
  bitr4d(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1)), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  adantl(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, universe), wb(wcel(c1, cdm(c0)), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  eldm2g(hs0, c1, universe, c0)
  syl6bb(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, universe)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1)), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)), wrex(s0, c0, wex(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(c1, cv(hs0))))))
  adantr(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, universe), wb(wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wex(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(c1, cv(hs0)))))))
  rexbidva(s0, c0, wrel(c0), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c1), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(c1, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  imp(wrel(c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sylbi(wrel(c0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe))), wss(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  df-rel(c0)
  ssel(c0, cxp(universe, universe), cv(s0))
  op1steq(hs0, cv(s0), universe, universe, c1)
  bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, wex(hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(c1, cv(hs0))))), wex(hs0, wcel(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)), wex(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(c1, cv(hs0))))))
  rexcom4(s0, hs0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(c1, cv(hs0))))
  exbii(hs0, wcel(cop(c1, cv(hs0)), c0), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cop(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  risset(s0, cop(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wrel.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.cop.s(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm releldm2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (Rel(c0)→(c1 ∈ dom(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(1st ` s0)= c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm5.21nd(Rel(c0), c1 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(1st ` s0)= c1), (Rel(c0)∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  anim2i(Rel(c0), c1 ∈ dom(c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c1, dom(c0))
  anim2i(Rel(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(1st ` s0)= c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  rexlimivw(s0, c0, (1st ` s0)= c1, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eqelr(c1, universe, (1st ` s0), (1st ` s0)= c1)
  id((1st ` s0)= c1)
  fvex(c1st, s0)
  bitr4d((Rel(c0)∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), c1 ∈ dom(c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(1st ` s0)= c1), ∃(hs0, < c1, hs0 > ∈ c0))
  adantl(Rel(c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c1 ∈ dom(c0)↔ ∃(hs0, < c1, hs0 > ∈ c0)))
  eldm2g(hs0, c1, universe, c0)
  syl6bb((Rel(c0)∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(1st ` s0)= c1), ∃(hs0, < c1, hs0 > ∈ c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0, s0 = < c1, hs0 >)))
  adantr(Rel(c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌, (∃(s0 ∈ c0,(1st ` s0)= c1)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0, s0 = < c1, hs0 >))))
  rexbidva(s0, c0, Rel(c0), (1st ` s0)= c1, ∃(hs0, s0 = < c1, hs0 >))
  syl((Rel(c0)∧ s0 ∈ c0), ((1st ` s0)= c1 ↔ ∃(hs0, s0 = < c1, hs0 >)), s0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  imp(Rel(c0), s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  sylbi(Rel(c0), (s0 ∈ c0 → s0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)), c0 ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  df-rel(c0)
  ssel(c0, (𝕌 × 𝕌), s0)
  op1steq(hs0, s0, universe, universe, c1)
  bitr4i(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0, s0 = < c1, hs0 >)), ∃(hs0, < c1, hs0 > ∈ c0), ∃(hs0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0 = < c1, hs0 >)))
  rexcom4(s0, hs0, c0, s0 = < c1, hs0 >)
  exbii(hs0, < c1, hs0 > ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, s0 = < c1, hs0 >))
  risset(s0, < c1, hs0 >, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wrel.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: reldm
blocks.content: An expression for the domain of a relation. (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm reldm(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wrel(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cdm(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))), wrel(c0))
  bitrd(wrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  releldm2(hs1, c0, cv(hs0))
  syl5rbb(wrel(c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c0))
  fnmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))
  fvex(c1st, cv(s0))
  fvelrnb(hs1, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), c0, cv(hs0))
  a1i(wrel(c0), wb(wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  rexbiia(hs1, c0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(hs1), c0, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c1st)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))
  fvex(c1st, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wrel(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, cv(hs1))
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm reldm(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (Rel(c0)→ dom(c0)= ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(1st ` s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, dom(c0), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(1st ` s0))), Rel(c0))

  releldm2(hs1, c0, hs0)

thm dfoprab3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {

  pm5.32i(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), wsbc(s2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), w1)), w0)
  sbc2iedv(s2, s3, cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), w1, w0)
  fvex(c1st, cv(s0))

  bicomd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))), w1, w0)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))), wb(w0, w1), wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))))

  anbi12i(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s3), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cv(s3)))
  eqcom(cv(s2), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))

thm dfoprab3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)∧ w0)} = { < < s2, s3 >, s1 > | w1 }

blocks.name: opabex2
blocks.content: Condition for an operation to be a set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabex2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(copab(s0, s1, w1), universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ssexd(copab(s0, s1, w1), cxp(c0, c2), universe, w0)
  xpexd(c0, c2, c1, c3, w0)
  opabssxpd(s0, s1, c0, c2, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opabex2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { < s0, s1 > | w1 } ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ w1)→ s0 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ w1)→ s1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  ssexd({ < s0, s1 > | w1 }, (c0 × c2), universe, w0)
  xpexd(c0, c2, c1, c3, w0)
  opabssxpd(s0, s1, c0, c2, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: opabn1stprc
blocks.content: An ordered-pair class abstraction which does not depend on the first abstraction variable is a proper class. There must be, however, at least one set which satisfies the restricting wff. (Contributed by AV, 27-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm opabn1stprc(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wex(s0, w0), wnel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(wex(s0, w0), wnel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe), wn(wcel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe)))
  nsyl(wex(s0, w0), wcel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe), wcel(cdm(copab(s1, s0, w0)), universe))
  eqneltrd(cdm(copab(s1, s0, w0)), universe, universe, wex(s0, w0))
  syl5eq(cdm(copab(s1, s0, w0)), universe, cdm(copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), universe), w0))), wex(s0, w0))
  dmeqi(copab(s1, s0, w0), copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), universe), w0)))
  opabbii(s1, s0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), universe), w0))
  biantrur(w0, wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  sylib(wex(s0, w0), wceq(cdm(copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), universe), w0))), universe), wral(s1, universe, wex(s0, w0)))
  ralrimivw(s1, universe, wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, w0))
  id(wex(s0, w0))
  dmopab3(s1, s0, universe, w0)
  a1i(wex(s0, w0), wn(wcel(universe, universe)))
  vprc()
  dmexg(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe)
  df-nel(copab(s1, s0, w0), universe)
  diff.wex.s(s1, s0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opabn1stprc(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0, w0)→ { < s1, s0 > | w0 } ∉ 𝕌)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(∃(s0, w0), { < s1, s0 > | w0 } ∉ 𝕌, ¬ { < s1, s0 > | w0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  nsyl(∃(s0, w0), { < s1, s0 > | w0 } ∈ 𝕌, dom({ < s1, s0 > | w0 })∈ 𝕌)
  eqneltrd(dom({ < s1, s0 > | w0 }), universe, universe, ∃(s0, w0))
  syl5eq(dom({ < s1, s0 > | w0 }), universe, dom({ < s1, s0 > |(s1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0)}), ∃(s0, w0))
  dmeqi({ < s1, s0 > | w0 }, { < s1, s0 > |(s1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0)})
  opabbii(s1, s0, w0, (s1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0))
  biantrur(w0, s1 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s1)
  sylib(∃(s0, w0), dom({ < s1, s0 > |(s1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0)})= 𝕌, ∀(s1 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, w0)))
  ralrimivw(s1, universe, ∃(s0, w0), ∃(s0, w0))
  id(∃(s0, w0))
  dmopab3(s1, s0, universe, w0)
  a1i(∃(s0, w0), ¬ 𝕌 ∈ 𝕌)
  vprc()
  dmexg({ < s1, s0 > | w0 }, universe)
  df-nel({ < s1, s0 > | w0 }, universe)
  diff.wex.s(s1, s0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cop.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: cnvoprab
blocks.content: The converse of a class abstraction of nested ordered pairs. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Aug-2017.) (Proof shortened by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvoprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), copab(s2, s3, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(w1, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3i(ccnv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), copab(s2, s3, w1), ccnv(copab(s3, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1))))
  cnveqi(copab(s3, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
  dfoprab3(s3, s2, s0, s1, w1, w0)
  3eqtr2i(ccnv(copab(s3, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1))), copab(s2, s3, w1), copab(s2, s3, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1)), cin(copab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe))), copab(s2, s3, w1)))
  cnvopab(s3, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1))
  inopab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)), w1)
  mpbi(wceq(cin(copab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe))), copab(s2, s3, w1)), copab(s2, s3, w1)), wss(copab(s2, s3, w1), copab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)))))
  ssopab2i(s2, s3, w1, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sseqin2(copab(s2, s3, w1), copab(s2, s3, wcel(cv(s3), cxp(universe, universe))))
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: dfxp3
blocks.content: Define the Cartesian product of three classes. Compare ~ df-xp . (Contributed by FL, 6-Nov-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfxp3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cxp(cxp(c0, c1), c2), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cxp(cxp(c0, c1), c2), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), copab(hs0, s2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2))))
  dfoprab4(hs0, s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, wcel(cv(s2), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  biidd(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  df-xp(hs0, s2, cxp(c0, c1), c2)
  oprabbii(s0, s1, s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c2)))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(s2), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s2), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfxp3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 × c1)× c2)= { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(((c0 × c1)× c2), { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2)}, { < hs0, s2 > |(hs0 ∈(c0 × c1)∧ s2 ∈ c2)}, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ s2 ∈ c2)})
  dfoprab4(hs0, s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, s2 ∈ c2, s2 ∈ c2)
  biidd(hs0 = < s0, s1 >, s2 ∈ c2)
  df-xp(hs0, s2, (c0 × c1), c2)
  oprabbii(s0, s1, s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2), ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ s2 ∈ c2))
  df-3an(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(s2 ∈ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s2, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s2, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 × c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: elopabi
blocks.content: A consequence of membership in an ordered-pair class abstraction, using ordered pair extractors. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm elopabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1st, c0)), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1, wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  eqeltrrd(cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0)), copab(s0, s1, w0), c0, wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)), wceq(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0))), wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  relopab(s0, s1, w0)
  1st2nd(copab(s0, s1, w0), c0)
  id(wcel(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  opelopab(s0, s1, cfv(c1st, c0), cfv(c2nd, c0), w0, w1, w2)
  fvex(c1st, c0)
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elopabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 } → w1)
  ⊣ (s0 =(1st ` c0)→(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 =(2nd ` c0)→(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylib(c0 ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, w1, <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)> ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  eqeltrrd(<(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, c0, c0 ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  mpan(c0 ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, c0 = <(1st ` c0),(2nd ` c0)>, Rel({ < s0, s1 > | w0 }))
  relopab(s0, s1, w0)
  1st2nd({ < s0, s1 > | w0 }, c0)
  id(c0 ∈ { < s0, s1 > | w0 })
  opelopab(s0, s1, (1st ` c0), (2nd ` c0), w0, w1, w2)
  fvex(c1st, c0)
  fvex(c2nd, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, c0)
  diff.c1st.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, c0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: eloprabi
blocks.content: A consequence of membership in an operation class abstraction, using ordered pair extractors. (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2006.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm eloprabi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0))), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0))), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, c0)), wb(w3, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1), diffss(s1, s2))
  syl(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  3exbidv(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0), wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0, wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  exlimiv(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))), w1)
  exlimiv(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)), w1)
  exlimiv(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0), w1)
  biimpa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  3bitrd(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0, w1, w2, w3)
  syl(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wb(w0, w2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0))))
  syl6req(cv(s0), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  fveq2d(c1st, cfv(c1st, c0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  op1st(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  syl(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wb(w2, w3), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0))))
  syl6req(cv(s1), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c2nd, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  fveq2d(c2nd, cfv(c1st, c0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  op1std(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  op2nd(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  syl(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wb(w3, w1), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, c0)))
  eqcomd(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, c0), wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  op2ndd(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  vex(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(c0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: mpt2mptsx
blocks.content: Express a two-argument function as a one-argument function, or vice-versa. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2mptsx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4ri(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))), cmpt(s2, ciun(hs0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2))))
  mpt2mptx(s2, hs0, hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2)))
  eqtrd(csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  csbeq1d(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  op1std(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  csbeq2dv(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  csbeq1d(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2, cv(hs1), wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  op2ndd(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  mpteq1i(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), ciun(hs0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  cbviun(s0, hs0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1), cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfcv(hs0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  nfxp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(s0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  xpeq12d(csn(cv(s0)), c1, csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sneq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  cbvmpt2x(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2)))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcv(hs1, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2))
  nfcsb(s1, s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs1), c2))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))

  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s2 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1))↦[(1st ` s2)/ s0][(2nd ` s2)/ s1]c2)

} = {
  3eqtr4ri((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s2 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1))↦[(1st ` s2)/ s0][(2nd ` s2)/ s1]c2), (s2 ∈ ⋃(hs0 ∈ c0,({ hs0 } ×[hs0 / s0]c1))↦[(1st ` s2)/ s0][(2nd ` s2)/ s1]c2), (hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈[hs0 / s0]c1 ↦[hs0 / s0][hs1 / s1]c2))

blocks.name: mpt2mpts
blocks.content: Express a two-argument function as a one-argument function, or vice-versa. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2mpts(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(s2, cxp(c0, c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtri(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(s2, cxp(c0, c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))), cmpt(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2))))
  mpt2mptsx(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2)
  mpteq1i(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(s2)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(s2)), c2)), cxp(c0, c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, csn(cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

thm dmmpt2ssx(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wss(cdm(c0), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)))

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sseqtr4i(cdm(c0), ciun(s0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), ciun(hs0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))
  dmmptss(hs1, c0, ciun(hs0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3)))
  3eqtr4i(c0, cmpt(hs1, ciun(hs0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3))), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cmpo(hs0, hs2, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3))))
  cbvmpt2x(s0, s1, hs0, hs2, c1, c2, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3)))
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c3)
  nfcv(hs2, c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3))
  nfcsb(s1, s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))

  sylan9eqr(c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3)), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs2)))
  csbeq1a(s1, cv(hs2), c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3))
  mpt2mptx(hs1, hs0, hs2, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3)))
  eqtrd(csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  csbeq1d(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3), cv(hs0), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  op1std(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  csbeq2dv(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3), csb(s1, cv(hs2), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  csbeq1d(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), c3, cv(hs2), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  op2ndd(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs2)
  cbviun(s0, hs0, c1, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfcv(hs0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))
  nfxp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))

  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  nfcsb1v(s1, hs2, c3)
  sylan9eqr(c3, [hs0 / s0][hs2 / s1]c3, [hs2 / s1]c3, s0 = hs0, s1 = hs2)
  csbeq1a(s1, hs2, c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, [hs2 / s1]c3)

  eqtrd([(1st ` hs1)/ s0][(2nd ` hs1)/ s1]c3, [hs0 / s0][hs2 / s1]c3, [hs0 / s0][(2nd ` hs1)/ s1]c3, hs1 = < hs0, hs2 >)
  csbeq1d(s0, (1st ` hs1), [(2nd ` hs1)/ s1]c3, hs0, hs1 = < hs0, hs2 >)

  nfcv(hs0, ({ s0 } × c2))
  nfxp(s0, { hs0 }, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(s0, { hs0 })
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  xpeq12d({ s0 }, c2, { hs0 }, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)

blocks.name: fmpt2
blocks.content: Functionality, domain and range of a class given by the maps-to notation. (Contributed by FL, 17-May-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm fmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wf(c4, cxp(c0, c1), c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wf(c4, cxp(c0, c1), c3), wf(c4, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3))
  fmpt2x(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  feq2i(c4, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3, cxp(c0, c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))↔(c4 :(c0 × c1)→ c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  bitri(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)), (c4 :(c0 × c1)→ c3), (c4 : ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1))→ c3))
  fmpt2x(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  feq2i(c4, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)), c3, (c0 × c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
}

  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))

  a1ii(wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c0, c1))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c0, c1)), wfn(c4, cxp(c0, c1)))

thm dmmpt2ga(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

blocks.name: dmmpt2g
blocks.content: Domain of an operation given by the maps-to notation, closed form of ~ dmmpt2 . Caution: This theorem is only valid in the very special case where the value of the mapping is a constant! (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jun-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Feb-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmmpt2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), cxp(c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), cxp(c3, c4)), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wcel(c0, c1))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c3, c4, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)))
  dmmpt2ga(s0, s1, c3, c4, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmmpt2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → dom(c2)=(c3 × c4))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, dom(c2)=(c3 × c4), ∀(s0 ∈ c3, ∀(s1 ∈ c4, c0 ∈ c1)))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c3, c4, c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ c1)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, (s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4))
  dmmpt2ga(s0, s1, c3, c4, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: mpt2exxg
blocks.content: Existence of an operation class abstraction (version for dependent domains). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2exxg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c4, universe))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c4, universe), wfun(c4), wcel(cdm(c4), universe))
  mpt2fun(s0, s1, c4, c0, c2, c5)
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(cdm(c4), universe), wss(cdm(c4), ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), universe))
  dmmpt2ssx(s0, s1, c4, c0, c2, c5)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2)), universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe)))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe))
  mpan(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c2), universe), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), universe))
  snex(cv(s0))

blocks.name: brovpreldm
blocks.content: If a binary relation holds for the result of an operation, the operands are in the domain of the operation. (Contributed by AV, 31-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: bropopvvv
blocks.content: If a binary relation holds for the result of an operation which is a result of an operation, the involved classes are sets. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Dec-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: ovmptss
blocks.content: If all the values of the mapping are subsets of a class ` X ` , then so is any evaluation of the mapping. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)

  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c([hs1 / s0]c1)
  diff.hs0.w([hs1 / s0][hs2 / s1]c2 ⊆ c3)
  diff.hs1.w([(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 ⊆ c3)
  diff.hs2.w([(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 ⊆ c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, < hs1, hs2 >)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, hs1, hs2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)

}

blocks.name: relmpt2opab
blocks.content: Any function to sets of ordered pairs produces a relation on function value unconditionally. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm relmpt2opab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wrel(co(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, copab(s2, s3, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s0, s3))
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s1, s3))
  a1ii(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), diffss(s2, s3))
  mpbir(wrel(co(c0, c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxp(universe, universe)))
  ax-mp(wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cxp(universe, universe)), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c4, wss(copab(s2, s3, w0), cxp(universe, universe)))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, c3, c4, wss(copab(s2, s3, w0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  mpbi(wss(copab(s2, s3, w0), cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(copab(s2, s3, w0)))
  relopab(s2, s3, w0)
  df-rel(copab(s2, s3, w0))
  ovmptss(s0, s1, c3, c4, copab(s2, s3, w0), cxp(universe, universe), c0, c1, c2)
  df-rel(co(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm relmpt2opab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ Rel((c0[c1]c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c4 ↦ { < s2, s3 > | w0 })
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(Rel((c0[c1]c2)), d(s0, s2))
  a1ii(Rel((c0[c1]c2)), d(s0, s3))
  a1ii(Rel((c0[c1]c2)), d(s1, s2))
  a1ii(Rel((c0[c1]c2)), d(s1, s3))
  a1ii(Rel((c0[c1]c2)), d(s2, s3))
  mpbir(Rel((c0[c1]c2)), (c0[c1]c2)⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  ax-mp((c0[c1]c2)⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌), ∀(s0 ∈ c3, ∀(s1 ∈ c4, { < s2, s3 > | w0 } ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, c3, c4, { < s2, s3 > | w0 } ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  mpbi({ < s2, s3 > | w0 } ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌), Rel({ < s2, s3 > | w0 }))
  relopab(s2, s3, w0)
  df-rel({ < s2, s3 > | w0 })
  ovmptss(s0, s1, c3, c4, { < s2, s3 > | w0 }, (𝕌 × 𝕌), c0, c1, c2)
  df-rel((c0[c1]c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm fmpt2co(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∘ c1)=(s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))→ c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(s2 ∈ c6 ↦ c7))
  ⊣ (s2 = c5 → c7 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0 ∘ c1), (s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), (hs0 ∈(c2 × c3)↦[[(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5 / s2]c7), w0)
  fmptcos(hs0, s2, c0, c1, (c2 × c3), [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5, c7, c6, w0)
  sylibr(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈(c2 × c3),[(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5 ∈ c6), ((s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5):(c2 × c3)→ c6))
  sylib(w0, ((s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5):(c2 × c3)→ c6), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3, c5 ∈ c6)))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c2, c3, w0, c5 ∈ c6)
  fmpt2(s0, s1, c2, c3, c5, c6, (s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5))
  fmpt(hs0, (c2 × c3), [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5, c6, (s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5))
  syl6eq(c1, (hs0 ∈(c2 × c3)↦[(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5), (s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5), w0)
  eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5), (hs0 ∈(c2 × c3)↦[(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5), (hs1 ∈ c2, hs2 ∈ c3 ↦[hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c5))
  cbvmpt2(s0, s1, hs1, hs2, c2, c3, c5, [hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c5)
  nfcv(hs1, c5)
  nfcv(hs2, c5)
  mpt2mpt(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c3, [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5, [hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c5)
  syl5eq((hs0 ∈(c2 × c3)↦[[(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5 / s2]c7), (s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), (s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦[c5 / s2]c7), w0)
  eqtr4i((hs0 ∈(c2 × c3)↦[[(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5 / s2]c7), (s0 ∈ c2, s1 ∈ c3 ↦[c5 / s2]c7), (hs1 ∈ c2, hs2 ∈ c3 ↦[[hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c5 / s2]c7))
  mpt2mpt(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c3, [[(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5 / s2]c7, [[hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c5 / s2]c7)
  csbeq1d(s2, [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5, c7, [hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c5, hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >)
  eqtrd([(2nd ` hs0)/ s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5, [hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c5, [hs2 / s1][(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5, hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >)
  csbeq1d(s1, (2nd ` hs0), [(1st ` hs0)/ s0]c5, hs2, hs0 = < hs1, hs2 >)
  op2ndd(hs0, hs1, hs2)

  cbvmpt2(s0, s1, hs1, hs2, c2, c3, [c5 / s2]c7, [[hs2 / s1][hs1 / s0]c5 / s2]c7)
  nfcv(hs1, [c5 / s2]c7)

thm oprabco(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c2, ccom(c0, c3)))

  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, cfv(c0, c6)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  syl6reqr(c2, ccom(c0, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, cfv(c0, c6)), wfn(c0, c1))
  fmpt2co(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c3, c4, c5, cfv(c0, c6), c6, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wfn(c0, c1))
  adantl(wfn(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(c6, c1))
  a1i(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6)))
  biimpi(wfn(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  dffn5(hs0, c0, c1)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c6, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)

  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {

thm 1stconst(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(cres(c1st, cxp(c2, csn(c0))), cxp(c2, csn(c0)), c2))

  alrimiv(hs1, wcel(c0, c1), wmo(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1st, cxp(c2, csn(c0))), cv(hs1))))

  moani(hs0, wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))
  moeq(hs0, cop(cv(hs1), c0))

  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cres(c1st, cxp(c2, csn(c0))), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1st, cv(hs1))))
  brresi(cv(hs0), c1st, cxp(c2, csn(c0)), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  syl5bbr(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), c1st, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1st, cv(hs1)))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1st, cv(hs1))), wfn(c1st, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  ax-mp(wfn(c1st, universe), wfo(c1st, universe, universe))
  fo1st()
  fofn(c1st, universe, universe)

  impbida(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0))))
  sylanb(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), csn(c0)))))
  elxp7(cv(hs0), c2, csn(c0))
