  anass1rs(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))
  eqopi(cv(hs0), universe, universe, cv(hs1), c0)
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, csn(c0)), cop(cv(hs1), c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))))
  opelxpd(cv(hs1), c0, c2, csn(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0))), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  eqtrd(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs1), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))))
  fveq2d(c1st, cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))))
  simprr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(cv(hs1), c0)), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  simprl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), c0))))
  op1stg(cv(hs1), c2, c0, c1)
  funcnv2(hs1, hs0, cres(c1st, cxp(c2, csn(c0))))
  dff1o3(cres(c1st, cxp(c2, csn(c0))), cxp(c2, csn(c0)), c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))

thm 1stconst(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →((1st |`(c2 × { c0 })):(c2 × { c0 })↔ c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ c1, ((1st |`(c2 × { c0 })):(c2 × { c0 })↔ c2), ((1st |`(c2 × { c0 })):(c2 × { c0 })↠ c2), Fun(`'(1st |`(c2 × { c0 }))))
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, ((1st |`(c2 × { c0 })):(c2 × { c0 })↠ c2), { c0 } ≠ ∅)
  snnzg(c0, c1)
  fo1stres({ c0 }, c2)
  sylibr(c0 ∈ c1, Fun(`'(1st |`(c2 × { c0 }))), ∀(hs1, ∃*(hs0, hs0[(1st |`(c2 × { c0 }))]hs1)))
  alrimiv(hs1, c0 ∈ c1, ∃*(hs0, hs0[(1st |`(c2 × { c0 }))]hs1))
  mpbiri(c0 ∈ c1, ∃*(hs0, hs0[(1st |`(c2 × { c0 }))]hs1), ∃*(hs0,(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)))
  moani(hs0, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)
  moeq(hs0, < hs1, c0 >)
  mobidv(hs0, c0 ∈ c1, hs0[(1st |`(c2 × { c0 }))]hs1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >))
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ c1, hs0[(1st |`(c2 × { c0 }))]hs1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >), (hs0 ∈(c2 × { c0 })∧ hs0[1st]hs1))
  brresi(hs0, c1st, (c2 × { c0 }), hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  syl5bbr(c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈(c2 × { c0 })∧ hs0[1st]hs1), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >), (hs0 ∈(c2 × { c0 })∧(1st ` hs0)= hs1))
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈(c2 × { c0 }), (1st ` hs0)= hs1, hs0[1st]hs1)
  mp2an(((1st ` hs0)= hs1 ↔ hs0[1st]hs1), 1st[Fn]𝕌, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ax-mp(1st[Fn]𝕌, (1st : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌))
  fo1st()
  fofn(c1st, universe, universe)
  vex(hs0)
  fnbrfvb(c1st, universe, hs0, hs1)
  impbida(c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈(c2 × { c0 })∧(1st ` hs0)= hs1), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >))
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈(c2 × { c0 })∧(1st ` hs0)= hs1), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >))
  sylanb(hs0 ∈(c2 × { c0 }), (1st ` hs0)= hs1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >), (hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)∧((1st ` hs0)∈ c2 ∧(2nd ` hs0)∈ { c0 })))
  elxp7(hs0, c2, { c0 })
  jca(((hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)∧((1st ` hs0)∈ c2 ∧(2nd ` hs0)∈ { c0 }))∧(1st ` hs0)= hs1), hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)
  adantll(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), ((1st ` hs0)∈ c2 ∧(2nd ` hs0)∈ { c0 }), (1st ` hs0)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c2)
  adantlr((1st ` hs0)∈ c2, (2nd ` hs0)∈ { c0 }, (1st ` hs0)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c2)
  biimpac((1st ` hs0)∈ c2, (1st ` hs0)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c2)
  eleq1((1st ` hs0), hs1, c2)
  adantlrl(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (1st ` hs0)∈ c2, (2nd ` hs0)∈ { c0 }, (1st ` hs0)= hs1, hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)
  sylanl2(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (2nd ` hs0)∈ { c0 }, (1st ` hs0)= hs1, hs0 = < hs1, c0 >, (2nd ` hs0)= c0)
  elsni((2nd ` hs0), c0)
  anass1rs(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (2nd ` hs0)= c0, (1st ` hs0)= hs1, hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)
  eqopi(hs0, universe, universe, hs1, c0)
  jca((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)), hs0 ∈(c2 × { c0 }), (1st ` hs0)= hs1)
  eqeltrd(hs0, (c2 × { c0 }), < hs1, c0 >, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)))
  opelxpd(hs1, c0, c2, { c0 }, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >), c0 ∈ { c0 })
  snidg(c0, c1)
  eqtrd((1st ` hs0), hs1, (1st ` < hs1, c0 >), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)))
  fveq2d(c1st, hs0, < hs1, c0 >, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)))
  simprr(c0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)), (1st ` < hs1, c0 >)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ c1)
  simprl(c0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 = < hs1, c0 >)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < hs1, c0 >))
  op1stg(hs1, c2, c0, c1)
  funcnv2(hs1, hs0, (1st |`(c2 × { c0 })))
  dff1o3((1st |`(c2 × { c0 })), (c2 × { c0 }), c2)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs0.c(< hs1, c0 >)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((1st |`(c2 × { c0 })))
  diff.hs0.c((1st |`(c2 × { c0 })))
}

  brresi(cv(hs0), c2nd, cxp(csn(c0), c2), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)

  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2nd, cv(hs1)))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2nd, cv(hs1))), wfn(c2nd, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  ax-mp(wfn(c2nd, universe), wfo(c2nd, universe, universe))
  fo2nd()
  fofn(c2nd, universe, universe)
  vex(hs0)
  fnbrfvb(c2nd, universe, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  impbida(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  sylanb(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c0)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  elxp7(cv(hs0), csn(c0), c2)

  eleq1(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), c2)
  adantlrr(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c0)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  sylanl2(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c0)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0))
  elsni(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0)
  anassrs(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  eqopi(cv(hs0), universe, universe, c0, cv(hs1))

  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c0), c2), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))))
  simprr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  opelxpd(c0, cv(hs1), csn(c0), c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, csn(c0)))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  simprl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  adantrl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(c0, cv(hs1)), c2nd)
  elvd(hs1, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, cv(hs1))), cv(hs1)))
  op2ndg(c0, c1, cv(hs1), universe)
  funcnv2(hs1, hs0, cres(c2nd, cxp(csn(c0), c2)))
  dff1o3(cres(c2nd, cxp(csn(c0), c2)), cxp(csn(c0), c2), c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cop(c0, cv(hs1)))

thm 2ndconst(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →((2nd |`({ c0 } × c2)):({ c0 } × c2)↔ c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ c1, ((2nd |`({ c0 } × c2)):({ c0 } × c2)↔ c2), ((2nd |`({ c0 } × c2)):({ c0 } × c2)↠ c2), Fun(`'(2nd |`({ c0 } × c2))))
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, ((2nd |`({ c0 } × c2)):({ c0 } × c2)↠ c2), { c0 } ≠ ∅)
  snnzg(c0, c1)
  fo2ndres({ c0 }, c2)
  sylibr(c0 ∈ c1, Fun(`'(2nd |`({ c0 } × c2))), ∀(hs1, ∃*(hs0, hs0[(2nd |`({ c0 } × c2))]hs1)))
  alrimiv(hs1, c0 ∈ c1, ∃*(hs0, hs0[(2nd |`({ c0 } × c2))]hs1))
  mpbiri(c0 ∈ c1, ∃*(hs0, hs0[(2nd |`({ c0 } × c2))]hs1), ∃*(hs0,(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)))
  moani(hs0, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)
  moeq(hs0, < c0, hs1 >)
  mobidv(hs0, c0 ∈ c1, hs0[(2nd |`({ c0 } × c2))]hs1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >))
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ c1, hs0[(2nd |`({ c0 } × c2))]hs1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >), (hs0 ∈({ c0 } × c2)∧ hs0[2nd]hs1))
  brresi(hs0, c2nd, ({ c0 } × c2), hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  syl5bbr(c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈({ c0 } × c2)∧ hs0[2nd]hs1), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >), (hs0 ∈({ c0 } × c2)∧(2nd ` hs0)= hs1))
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈({ c0 } × c2), (2nd ` hs0)= hs1, hs0[2nd]hs1)
  mp2an(((2nd ` hs0)= hs1 ↔ hs0[2nd]hs1), 2nd[Fn]𝕌, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ax-mp(2nd[Fn]𝕌, (2nd : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌))
  fo2nd()
  fofn(c2nd, universe, universe)
  vex(hs0)
  fnbrfvb(c2nd, universe, hs0, hs1)
  impbida(c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈({ c0 } × c2)∧(2nd ` hs0)= hs1), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >))
  adantl(c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈({ c0 } × c2)∧(2nd ` hs0)= hs1), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >))
  sylanb(hs0 ∈({ c0 } × c2), (2nd ` hs0)= hs1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >), (hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)∧((1st ` hs0)∈ { c0 } ∧(2nd ` hs0)∈ c2)))
  elxp7(hs0, { c0 }, c2)
  jca(((hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌)∧((1st ` hs0)∈ { c0 } ∧(2nd ` hs0)∈ c2))∧(2nd ` hs0)= hs1), hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)
  adantll(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), ((1st ` hs0)∈ { c0 } ∧(2nd ` hs0)∈ c2), (2nd ` hs0)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c2)
  adantll((1st ` hs0)∈ { c0 }, (2nd ` hs0)∈ c2, (2nd ` hs0)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c2)
  biimpac((2nd ` hs0)∈ c2, (2nd ` hs0)= hs1, hs1 ∈ c2)
  eleq1((2nd ` hs0), hs1, c2)
  adantlrr(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (1st ` hs0)∈ { c0 }, (2nd ` hs0)∈ c2, (2nd ` hs0)= hs1, hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)
  sylanl2(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (1st ` hs0)∈ { c0 }, (2nd ` hs0)= hs1, hs0 = < c0, hs1 >, (1st ` hs0)= c0)
  elsni((1st ` hs0), c0)
  anassrs(hs0 ∈(𝕌 × 𝕌), (1st ` hs0)= c0, (2nd ` hs0)= hs1, hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)
  eqopi(hs0, universe, universe, c0, hs1)

  eqeltrd(hs0, ({ c0 } × c2), < c0, hs1 >, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)))

  opelxpd(c0, hs1, { c0 }, c2, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)))
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = < c0, hs1 >), c0 ∈ { c0 })
  snidg(c0, c1)
  simprl(c0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)
  adantrl(c0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 = < c0, hs1 >, (2nd ` hs0)= hs1)
  sylan9eqr((2nd ` hs0), hs1, (2nd ` < c0, hs1 >), c0 ∈ c1, hs0 = < c0, hs1 >)
  fveq2(hs0, < c0, hs1 >, c2nd)

  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((2nd |`({ c0 } × c2)))
  diff.hs0.c((2nd |`({ c0 } × c2)))
}

thm dfmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), ciun(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), ciun(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), ciun(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))))
  mpt2mpts(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  dfmpt(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  csbex(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  csbex(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)
  iunxpf(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, csn(cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))), csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  nfsn(s0, cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  nfop(s0, cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  nfsn(s1, cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  nfop(s1, cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfcsb(s1, s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  nfcv(s1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))
  nfcsb1v(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)
  nfcv(hs0, csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  opeq12d(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  csbopeq1a(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, cv(hs0))
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, cv(hs0))
  diff.c1st.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, cv(hs0))
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))
}

thm dfmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)= ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, { < < s0, s1 >, c2 > }))
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtri((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, { < < s0, s1 >, c2 > })), (hs0 ∈(c0 × c1)↦[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2), ⋃(hs0 ∈(c0 × c1), { < hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 > }))
  mpt2mpts(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  dfmpt(hs0, (c0 × c1), [(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  csbex(s0, (1st ` hs0), [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  csbex(s1, (2nd ` hs0), c2)
  iunxpf(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, { < hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 > }, { < < s0, s1 >, c2 > })
  nfsn(s0, < hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 >)
  nfop(s0, hs0, [(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcsb1v(s0, (1st ` hs0), [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  nfsn(s1, < hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 >)
  nfop(s1, hs0, [(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, (1st ` hs0), [(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2)
  nfcv(s1, (1st ` hs0))
  nfcsb1v(s1, (2nd ` hs0), c2)
  nfcv(hs0, { < < s0, s1 >, c2 > })
  sneqd(< hs0,[(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2 >, < < s0, s1 >, c2 >, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  opeq12d(hs0, [(1st ` hs0)/ s0][(2nd ` hs0)/ s1]c2, < s0, s1 >, c2, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  id(hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  csbopeq1a(s0, s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, hs0)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1st, hs0)
  diff.c1st.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2nd, hs0)
  diff.c2nd.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c({ < < s0, s1 >, c2 > })
}

thm mpt2sn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(c6, csn(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4))))
  -| wceq(c6, cmpo(s0, s1, csn(c0), csn(c2), c7))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c7, c8))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(c8, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(c6, csn(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4)), cmpt(hs0, cxp(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c7))), cmpt(hs0, csn(cop(c0, c2)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c7))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  mpteq1d(hs0, cxp(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c7)), csn(cop(c0, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(cxp(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csn(cop(c0, c2))))
  xpsng(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(c6, cmpt(hs0, cxp(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c7)))))
  eqtri(c6, cmpt(hs0, cxp(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c7))), cmpo(s0, s1, csn(c0), csn(c2), c7))
  mpt2mpts(s0, s1, hs0, csn(c0), csn(c2), c7)
  fmptsnd(hs0, cop(c0, c2), c4, csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c7)), universe, c5, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  mp2and(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csb(s1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c7)), c4), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2), wceq(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), c2))
  op2ndg(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  eqeq1d(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)))
  eqcomd(cfv(c2nd, cop(c0, c2)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2), c2nd)
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0))
  op1stg(c0, c1, c2, c3)

blocks.name: curry1
blocks.content: Composition with ` ``' ( 2nd |`` ( { C } X. _V ) ) ` turns any binary operation ` F ` with a constant first operand into a function ` G ` of the second operand only. This transformation is called "currying." (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Dec-2014.)

blocks.content: The value of a curried function with a constant first argument. (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

thm curry1val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(c4, c5), co(c3, c0, c5)))
  -| wceq(c4, ccom(c0, ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(csn(c3), universe)))))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c4, c5), co(c3, c0, c5), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(hs0))), c5), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)))
  fveq1d(c4, c5, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)))
  curry1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  pm2.61d2(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(hs0))), c5), co(c3, c0, c5)), wcel(c5, c2))
  ex(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wn(wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(hs0))), c5), co(c3, c0, c5)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(hs0))), c5), co(c3, c0, c5), emptycls, wa(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wn(wcel(c5, c2))))
  adantl(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wn(wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(hs0))), c5), emptycls))
  fvmptndm(hs0, c5, c2, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(hs0))), co(c3, c0, cv(hs0)))
  syl2an(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wn(wcel(c5, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c0, c5), emptycls), wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), wn(wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c5, c2))))
  adantr(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2)))
  fndm(c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  con3i(wcel(c5, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c5, c2)))
  simpr(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c5, c2))
  ndmovg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)

  oveq2(cv(hs0), c5, c3, c0)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c3, c0, cv(hs0))))
  ovex(c3, c0, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c3, c0, c5))
}

thm curry1val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c1)→(c4 ` c5)=(c3[c0]c5))
  ⊣ c4 =(c0 ∘ `'(2nd |`({ c3 } × 𝕌)))
} = {
  eqtrd((c4 ` c5), (c3[c0]c5), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0))` c5), (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  fveq1d(c4, c5, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0)), (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  curry1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  pm2.61d2((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c1), ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0))` c5)=(c3[c0]c5), c5 ∈ c2)
  ex((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c1), ¬ c5 ∈ c2, ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0))` c5)=(c3[c0]c5))
  eqtr4d(((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0))` c5), (c3[c0]c5), emptycls, ((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c1)∧ ¬ c5 ∈ c2))
  adantl((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c1), ¬ c5 ∈ c2, ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0))` c5)= ∅)
  fvmptndm(hs0, c5, c2, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0)), (c3[c0]hs0))
  syl2an((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c1), ¬ c5 ∈ c2, (c3[c0]c5)= ∅, dom(c0)=(c1 × c2), ¬(c3 ∈ c1 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  adantr(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c3 ∈ c1, dom(c0)=(c1 × c2))
  fndm(c0, (c1 × c2))
  con3i(c5 ∈ c2, (c3 ∈ c1 ∧ c5 ∈ c2))
  simpr(c3 ∈ c1, c5 ∈ c2)
  ndmovg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  fvmpt(hs0, c5, c2, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0)), (c3[c0]c5), (c3[c0]hs0))
  oveq2(hs0, c5, c3, c0)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c3[c0]hs0)))
  ovex(c3, c0, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c((c3[c0]c5))
}

blocks.name: curry1f
blocks.content: Functionality of a curried function with a constant first argument. (Contributed by NM, 29-Mar-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm curry1f(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c1)), wf(c5, c2, c3))

} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c5, c2, c3, co(c4, c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c1)))
  sylan(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c1), wceq(c5, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(c4, c0, cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  ffn(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3)
  curry1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5)
  3expa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(co(c4, c0, cv(hs0)), c3))
  fovrn(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm curry1f(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c1)→(c5 : c2 → c3))
  ⊣ c5 =(c0 ∘ `'(2nd |`({ c4 } × 𝕌)))
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c5, c2, c3, (c4[c0]hs0), ((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c1))
  sylan((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3), c4 ∈ c1, c5 =(hs0 ∈ c2 ↦(c4[c0]hs0)), c0[Fn](c1 × c2))
  ffn(c0, (c1 × c2), c3)
  curry1(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5)
  3expa((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3), c4 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2, (c4[c0]hs0)∈ c3)
  fovrn(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: curry2
blocks.content: Composition with ` ``' ( 1st |`` ( _V X. { C } ) ) ` turns any binary operation ` F ` with a constant second operand into a function ` G ` of the first operand only. This transformation is called "currying." (If this becomes frequently used, we can introduce a new notation for the hypothesis.) (Contributed by NM, 16-Dec-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm curry2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c0, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, ccom(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cv(s0), c0, c3)), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)))
  sylib(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), wfn(c4, c1))
  sylanbrc(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wfn(c4, c1), wfun(ccom(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3)))))), wceq(cdm(ccom(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3)))))), c1))
  syl2an(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wfun(ccom(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3)))))), wfun(c0), wfun(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))))
  fnfun(c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  syl(wcel(c3, c2), wfun(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), wf1o(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))), cxp(universe, csn(c3)), universe))
  simprbi(wf1o(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))), cxp(universe, csn(c3)), universe), wfun(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), wfo(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))), cxp(universe, csn(c3)), universe))
  dff1o3(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))), cxp(universe, csn(c3)), universe)
  funco(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3)))))
  syl5eq(cdm(ccom(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3)))))), c1, cima(ccnv(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), cdm(c0)), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)))
  dmco(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3)))))
  eqtrd(cima(ccnv(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), cdm(c0)), c1, cima(ccnv(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)))
  adantr(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2)))
  fndm(c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  adantl(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cima(ccnv(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), cxp(c1, c2)), c1))
  syl5eq(cima(ccnv(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), cxp(c1, c2)), c1, crn(cres(c1st, cin(cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2)))), wcel(c3, c2))
  3eqtri(cima(ccnv(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))), cxp(c1, c2)), crn(cres(c1st, cin(cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2)))), cima(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))), cxp(c1, c2)), crn(cres(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))), cxp(c1, c2))))
  imacnvcnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))), cxp(c1, c2))

  rneqi(cres(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))), cxp(c1, c2)), cres(c1st, cin(cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2))))
  resres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2))
  eqtrd(crn(cres(c1st, cin(cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2)))), c1, crn(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, csn(c3)))), wcel(c3, c2))
  rneqd(cres(c1st, cin(cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2))), cres(c1st, cxp(c1, csn(c3))), wcel(c3, c2))
  reseq2d(c1st, cin(cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c1, csn(c3)), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl5eq(cin(cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c1, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, cin(csn(c3), c2)), wcel(c3, c2))
  eqtri(cin(cxp(universe, csn(c3)), cxp(c1, c2)), cxp(c1, cin(csn(c3), c2)), cxp(cin(universe, c1), cin(csn(c3), c2)))
  inxp(universe, csn(c3), c1, c2)
  xpeq1i(cin(universe, c1), cin(csn(c3), c2), c1)
  eqtri(cin(universe, c1), c1, cin(c1, universe))
  incom(universe, c1)
  inv1(c1)
  xpeq2d(c1, cin(csn(c3), c2), csn(c3), wcel(c3, c2))

  snssi(c3, c2)
  df-ss(csn(c3), c2)

blocks.name: curry2f
blocks.content: Functionality of a curried function with a constant second argument. (Contributed by NM, 16-Dec-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm curry2f(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c2)), wf(c5, c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, ccom(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c4))))))
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c5, c1, c3, co(cv(hs0), c0, c4), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c2)))
  sylan(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(c5, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c4))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  ffn(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3)
  curry2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5)
  3expa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c0, c4), c3))
  3com23(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c0, c4), c3))
  fovrn(c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wcel(c4, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm curry2f(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c2)→(c5 : c1 → c3))
  ⊣ c5 =(c0 ∘ `'(1st |`(𝕌 × { c4 })))
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c5, c1, c3, (hs0[c0]c4), ((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c2))
  sylan((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3), c4 ∈ c2, c5 =(hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c4)), c0[Fn](c1 × c2))
  ffn(c0, (c1 × c2), c3)
  curry2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5)
  3expa((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3), c4 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c1, (hs0[c0]c4)∈ c3)
  3com23((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3), c4 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c1, (hs0[c0]c4)∈ c3)
  fovrn(c0, c1, c2, c3, hs0, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3)∧ c4 ∈ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

thm curry2val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c5), co(c5, c0, c3)))

} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c4, c5), co(c5, c0, c3), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), c5), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)))
  fveq1d(c4, c5, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)))
  curry2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  pm2.61d2(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), c5), co(c5, c0, c3)), wcel(c5, c1))
  adantr(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wn(wcel(c5, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), c5), co(c5, c0, c3))))
  ex(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c5, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), c5), co(c5, c0, c3)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), c5), co(c5, c0, c3), emptycls, wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c5, c1))))
  adantl(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c5, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), c5), emptycls))
  fvmptndm(hs0, c5, c1, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), co(cv(hs0), c0, c3))
  syl2an(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c5, c1)), wceq(co(c5, c0, c3), emptycls), wceq(cdm(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), wn(wa(wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c3, c2))))
  fndm(c0, cxp(c1, c2))

  simpl(wcel(c5, c1), wcel(c3, c2))
  ndmovg(c0, c1, c2, c5, c3)
  fvmpt(hs0, c5, c1, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)), co(c5, c0, c3), co(cv(hs0), c0, c3))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c5, c0, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cv(hs0), c0, c3)))
  ovex(c5, c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c5, c0, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm curry2val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c4 ` c5)=(c5[c0]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(c0 ∘ `'(1st |`(𝕌 × { c3 })))
} = {
  eqtrd((c4 ` c5), (c5[c0]c3), ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3))` c5), (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  fveq1d(c4, c5, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3)), (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  curry2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  pm2.61d2((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2), ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3))` c5)=(c5[c0]c3), c5 ∈ c1)
  adantr(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c3 ∈ c2, (¬ c5 ∈ c1 →((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3))` c5)=(c5[c0]c3)))
  ex(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), ¬ c5 ∈ c1, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3))` c5)=(c5[c0]c3))
  eqtr4d(((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3))` c5), (c5[c0]c3), emptycls, (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ ¬ c5 ∈ c1))
  adantl(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), ¬ c5 ∈ c1, ((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3))` c5)= ∅)
  fvmptndm(hs0, c5, c1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3)), (hs0[c0]c3))
  syl2an(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), ¬ c5 ∈ c1, (c5[c0]c3)= ∅, dom(c0)=(c1 × c2), ¬(c5 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  fndm(c0, (c1 × c2))
  con3i(c5 ∈ c1, (c5 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  simpl(c5 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c2)
  ndmovg(c0, c1, c2, c5, c3)
  fvmpt(hs0, c5, c1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3)), (c5[c0]c3), (hs0[c0]c3))
  oveq1(hs0, c5, c0, c3)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(hs0[c0]c3)))
  ovex(c5, c0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c((c5[c0]c3))

thm cnvf1olem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))), wa(wcel(c2, ccnv(c0)), wceq(c1, cuni(ccnv(csn(c2))))))
} = {
  jca(wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))), wcel(c2, ccnv(c0)), wceq(c1, cuni(ccnv(csn(c2)))))
  eqeltrd(c2, ccnv(c0), cop(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1)), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  sylibr(wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))), wcel(cop(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1)), c0))
  eqeltrrd(cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1)), c0, c1, wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  simprl(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))
  opelcnv(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1), c0)
  fvex(c2nd, c1)
  fvex(c1st, c1)
  3eqtr4a(c1, cuni(ccnv(csn(c2))), cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1)), cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1))))), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  eqcomi(cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1)), cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1))))))
  opswap(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1))
  unieqd(ccnv(csn(c2)), ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1)))), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  cnveqd(csn(c2), csn(cop(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1))), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  sneqd(c2, cop(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1)), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  syl6eq(c2, cop(cfv(c2nd, c1), cfv(c1st, c1)), cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1))))), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  eqtrd(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1))))), cuni(ccnv(csn(c1))), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  simprr(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))
  unieqd(ccnv(csn(c1)), ccnv(csn(cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1)))), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  cnveqd(csn(c1), csn(cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1))), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  sneqd(c1, cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1)), wa(wrel(c0), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))))))
  adantrr(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(ccnv(csn(c1)))), wceq(c1, cop(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1))))
  1st2nd(c0, c1)
  opswap(cfv(c1st, c1), cfv(c2nd, c1))

blocks.name: cnvf1o
blocks.content: Describe a function that maps the elements of a set to its converse bijectively. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvf1o(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wrel(c0), wf1o(cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(s0))))), c0, ccnv(c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  f1od(s0, hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(s0))))), c0, ccnv(c0), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(s0)))), universe, cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))), universe, wrel(c0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(s0))))))
  a1i(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(s0)))), universe))
  uniex(ccnv(csn(cv(s0))))
  cnvex(csn(cv(s0)))
  snex(cv(s0))
  a1i(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), ccnv(c0))), wcel(cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))), universe))
  uniex(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))
  cnvex(csn(cv(hs0)))
  snex(cv(hs0))

blocks.name: f1o2ndf1
blocks.content: The ` 2nd ` (second component of an ordered pair) function restricted to a one-to-one function ` F ` is a one-to-one function from ` F ` onto the range of ` F ` . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Feb-2018.)

blocks.name: algrflem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ algrf and related theorems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm algrflem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, ccom(c1, c1st), c2), cfv(c1, c0))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {
  3eqtri(co(c0, ccom(c1, c1st), c2), cfv(c1, c0), cfv(ccom(c1, c1st), cop(c0, c2)), cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2))))
  df-ov(c0, ccom(c1, c1st), c2)
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, c1st), cop(c0, c2)), cfv(c1, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)))), wf(c1st, universe, universe), wcel(cop(c0, c2), universe))
  ax-mp(wf(c1st, universe, universe), wfo(c1st, universe, universe))
  fo1st()
  fof(c1st, universe, universe)
  opex(c0, c2)
  fvco3(c1st, universe, universe, cop(c0, c2), c1)
  fveq2i(c1, cfv(c1st, cop(c0, c2)), c0)
  op1st(c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm algrflem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[(c1 ∘ 1st)]c2)=(c1 ` c0)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  3eqtri((c0[(c1 ∘ 1st)]c2), (c1 ` c0), ((c1 ∘ 1st)` < c0, c2 >), (c1 `(1st ` < c0, c2 >)))
  df-ov(c0, (c1 ∘ 1st), c2)
  mp2an(((c1 ∘ 1st)` < c0, c2 >)=(c1 `(1st ` < c0, c2 >)), (1st : 𝕌 → 𝕌), < c0, c2 > ∈ 𝕌)
  ax-mp((1st : 𝕌 → 𝕌), (1st : 𝕌 ↠ 𝕌))
  fo1st()
  fof(c1st, universe, universe)
  opex(c0, c2)
  fvco3(c1st, universe, universe, < c0, c2 >, c1)
  fveq2i(c1, (1st ` < c0, c2 >), c0)
  op1st(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: frxp
blocks.content: A lexicographical ordering of two well-founded classes. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wfr(c2, c3)), wfr(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wal(hs0, wi(wa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs2))))))))
  alrimiv(hs0, wa(wfr(c0, c1), wfr(c2, c3)), wi(wa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs2)))))))
  mpdd(wa(wfr(c0, c1), wfr(c2, c3)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c4, cv(hs2))))), wrex(hs4, cdm(cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs3), c0, cv(hs4))))))
  adantr(wfr(c0, c1), wfr(c2, c3), wi(wa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wrex(hs4, cdm(cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs3), c0, cv(hs4)))))))
  syl5(wfr(c0, c1), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wrex(hs4, cdm(cv(hs0)), wral(hs3, cdm(cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs3), c0, cv(hs4))))), wa(wss(cdm(cv(hs0)), c1), wne(cdm(cv(hs0)), emptycls)))
  jca(wa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wss(cdm(cv(hs0)), c1), wne(cdm(cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  syldan(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wss(cdm(cv(hs0)), c1), wne(c3, emptycls))
  syl(wa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wne(c3, emptycls), wne(cxp(c1, c3), emptycls))
  ssn0(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3))
  simprd(wne(cxp(c1, c3), emptycls), wne(c3, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls))
  biimpri(wne(cxp(c1, c3), emptycls), wa(wne(c1, emptycls), wne(c3, emptycls)))
  xpnz(c1, c3)
  impcom(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(c3, emptycls), wss(cdm(cv(hs0)), c1))
  syl(wne(c3, emptycls), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wss(cdm(cv(hs0)), c1)), wceq(cdm(cxp(c1, c3)), c1))
  dmxp(c3, c1)
  syl5ib(wceq(cdm(cxp(c1, c3)), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wss(cdm(cv(hs0)), c1), wss(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cxp(c1, c3))))
  dmss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3))
  sseq2(cdm(cxp(c1, c3)), c1, cdm(cv(hs0)))
  biimpa(wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wne(cdm(cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  necon3bid(cv(hs0), emptycls, cdm(cv(hs0)), emptycls, wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c3)))

blocks.name: soxp
blocks.content: A lexicographical ordering of two strictly ordered classes. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.)

blocks.name: wexp
blocks.content: A lexicographical ordering of two well-ordered classes. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Mar-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm wexp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wwe(c2, c3)), wwe(c4, cxp(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c1, c3)), wcel(cv(s1), cxp(c1, c3))), wo(wbr(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), c0, cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wwe(c2, c3)), wwe(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wfr(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wor(c4, cxp(c1, c3)))
  syl2an(wwe(c0, c1), wwe(c2, c3), wfr(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wfr(c0, c1), wfr(c2, c3))
  wefr(c0, c1)
  wefr(c2, c3)
  frxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl2an(wwe(c0, c1), wwe(c2, c3), wor(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), wor(c0, c1), wor(c2, c3))
  weso(c0, c1)
  weso(c2, c3)
  soxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  df-we(c4, cxp(c1, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wexp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c2 ≤ c3)→ c4 ≤(c1 × c3))
  ⊣ c4 = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(c1 × c3)∧ s1 ∈(c1 × c3))∧((1st ` s0)[c0](1st ` s1)∨((1st ` s0)=(1st ` s1)∧(2nd ` s0)[c2](2nd ` s1))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c2 ≤ c3), c4 ≤(c1 × c3), c4[Fr](c1 × c3), c4 ≺(c1 × c3))
  syl2an(c0 ≤ c1, c2 ≤ c3, c4[Fr](c1 × c3), c0[Fr]c1, c2[Fr]c3)
  wefr(c0, c1)
  wefr(c2, c3)
  frxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl2an(c0 ≤ c1, c2 ≤ c3, c4 ≺(c1 × c3), c0 ≺ c1, c2 ≺ c3)
  weso(c0, c1)
  weso(c2, c3)
  soxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  df-we(c4, (c1 × c3))
}

blocks.name: fnwe
blocks.content: A variant on lexicographic order, which sorts first by some function of the base set, and then by a "backup" well-ordering when the function value is equal on both elements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: fnse
blocks.content: Condition for the well-order in ~ fnwe to be set-like. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnse(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wse(c0, c1))

  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wse(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c2), cv(s2)), universe))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wse(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))), universe)))

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c2, cv(s2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
